snippet.title: Kenshi v0.90 Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
The beta release of Kenshi is now out (31/03/2016).

A single player squad-based sandbox RPG set in a huge 355 square mile seamless world map.  

Kenshi is currently available as alpha-funded on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/233...

Official website:
http://www.lofigames.com

Soundtrack by Kole Hicks:
http://kolemusician.com/
